title: GL Entry Reversal Request Event
description: Request to reverse an existing journal entry by creating an inverse entry. This event is idempotent on event_id. The reversal entry will have all debit/credit amounts swapped and will link back to the original entry via reverses_entry_id.

event_id.description: Unique identifier for this reversal request. Used for idempotency - duplicate event_id must be ignored by consumer.

occurred_at.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the reversal was requested.

source_version.description: Semantic version of the source module that generated this event.

correlation_id.description: Optional correlation identifier for tracing related events.

causation_id.description: Optional causation identifier linking this reversal to its trigger.

original_entry_id.description: ID of the journal entry to reverse.
